Title: Ann Mariya Kalippilanu
Writer: John Manthrickal (screenplay), Midhun Manuel Thomas (story and screenplay)
Actors: Sunny Wayne, Sara Arjun, Aju Varghese, Dulquer Salmaan
Plot: Ann Mariya, a jovial kid hires a goon, Gireesh due to an incident at school. Her kindness causes Gireesh to change his morals and they become great friends. Family problems and her desire to be no. 1 at long jump form the rest of the story.
